text.div:
TWCore

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

https://twcore.mohw.gov.tw/fhir/ImplementationGuide/twcore.mohw.gov.tw

臺灣核心實作指引(TW Core IG)

name: TWCore
title: 臺灣核心實作指引(TW Core IG)
description: 臺灣核心實作指引(TW Core IG)

grouping.name: Behavior: Capability Statements
grouping.description: The following artifacts define the specific capabilities that different types of systems are expected to have in order to comply with this implementation guide.  Systems conforming to this implementation guide are expected to declare conformance to one or more of the following capability statements.

grouping.name: Behavior: Operation Definitions
grouping.description: These are custom operations that can be supported by and/or invoked by systems conforming to this implementation guide

grouping.name: Behavior: Search Parameters
grouping.description: These define the properties by which a RESTful server can be searched.  They can also be used for sorting and including related resources.

grouping.name: Structures: Logical Models
grouping.description: These define data models that represent the domain covered by this implementation guide in more business-friendly terms than the underlying FHIR resources.

grouping.name: Structures: Resource Profiles
grouping.description: These define constraints on FHIR resources for systems conforming to this implementation guide

grouping.name: Structures: Data Type Profiles
grouping.description: These define constraints on FHIR data types for systems conforming to this implementation guide

grouping.name: Structures: Extension Definitions
grouping.description: These define constraints on FHIR data types for systems conforming to this implementation guide

grouping.name: Terminology: Value Sets
grouping.description: These define sets of codes used by systems conforming to this implementation guide

grouping.name: Terminology: Code Systems
grouping.description: These define new code systems used by systems conforming to this implementation guide

grouping.name: Example: Example Instances
grouping.description: These are example instances that show what data produced and consumed by systems conforming with this implementation guide might look like

grouping.name: Other
grouping.description: These are resources that are used within this implementation guide that do not fit into one of the other categories

resource.name: 機構基本資料

resource.name: TW Core Organization
resource.description: 此臺灣核心-機構(TW Core Organization) Profile說明本IG如何進一步定義FHIR的Organization Resource以呈現機構基本資料  [[*FMM1*](http://build.fhir.org/versions.html#maturity)]

resource.name: TW Core Address
resource.description:
此臺灣核心-地址(TW Core Address) Profile說明本IG如何進一步定義FHIR的Address資料類型以呈現臺灣地址。  
本Profile之擴充的資料項目(Extension)為參照[初診基本資料表](https://www.eck.org.tw/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/ECK_FIRSTVIEW_INFOR.pdf)之欄位與[中華郵政地址英譯寫法](https://www.post.gov.tw/post/internet/Postal/sz_a_e_ta1.jsp)，若貴機構有詳細地址資訊之需求，可依情況填選；若無需區分詳細地址資訊，可使用原生欄位`text`、`line`、`district`呈現。

resource.name: 讀取病人(Patient)紀錄
resource.description: 此操作用於回傳與調用與病人(Patient)相關的所有Resource。回傳的Bundle類型為「searchset」。至少將會回傳病人(Patient) Resource本身，以及伺服器中具有的與病人(Patient)相關且可供給定使用者使用的任何其他Resource。伺服器將回傳支援紀錄所需的任何Resource，例如相關的健康照護服務提供者，用藥，位置，機構等。

resource.name: 藥品藥理治療分類ATC碼值集
resource.description:
藥品藥理治療分類ATC碼值集，參照至[https://data.gov.tw/dataset/9119](https://data.gov.tw/dataset/9119)，資料提供單位：衛生福利部食品藥物管理署。  

此值集共包含25個[擴充代碼](ValueSet-medcation-atc-tw.html#expansion)，這些代碼未於[http://www.whocc.no/atc](http://www.whocc.no/atc)定義，但[台灣藥品藥理治療分類ATC碼資料集](https://data.gov.tw/dataset/9119](https://data.gov.tw/dataset/9119)有使用之。
